subject: Pedal info and potential review
description_text:
Hi,

I am a content creator and have seen a lot of your posts recently and like
what I see of your pedals.

I do have a couple of questions though if you can help.

1. Can hese pedals connect directly to a fanatec base. E.g the DD Pro

2. Can these work on PS5 without the need for a PC


Additionally could you provide some information in your affiliate programme
and also what the process is for getting a set of pedals for review.

My YouTube channel is https://youtube.com/@chunkyribena?si=3inDvJSb8EhS3GEh

Best Regards
Helder Ribeiro

conversations.body_text: Hi Helder Ribeiro,    Apologies, our pedal is only compatible with PC. It provides a USB connection to the PC, thus being compatible with all devices.  Should you require a pedal for review purposes, our manager will review your channel and propose a solution.

Thank you for the reply. If they are PC only at this moment a review might
not be best as I focus on both console and pc equipment so being pc only
wouldn't fit too well for my viewers needs.

I'll inform if that changes or please advise if you ever add capabilities
for console.

Many thanks
Helder
